attributes.source: Reward for inviting Sigewinne to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Rebound Hydrotherapy
skills.desc: Create 1 Large Bolstering Bubblebalm and insert as the third card from the top of your deck. This character gains 3 stacks of Bond of Life. (After the Large Bolstering Bubblebalm effect is triggered, create a Medium Bolstering Bubblebalm and place in your opponent's deck. After the Medium Bolstering Bubblebalm effect is triggered, create a Small Bolstering Bubblebalm and place in your deck.)

skills.name: Super Saturated Syringing
skills.desc: Deals 2 Hydro DMG, then performs "Prepare Skill" for Medical Intervention of Pure Intention.

skills.name: Detailed Diagnosis, Thorough Treatment
skills.desc:
(Passive) When Bond of Life attached to your character is completely removed, this character gains 1 extra Max HP. (Up to 3 times per character)
When you switch to this character: If your side has Sourcewater Droplet, -1 to their Usage(s), and this character gains 1 Energy.
